title: Do you lose anything when you move to a new region?
body:
My friend (who happens to have an incredibly weeaboo username) keeps wanting to boast about how many wins he has but he 'lost a lot of it' when he switched from Garena over to OCE. Seeing that I'm moving to US at the very very end of the year (and thus transferring to NA) and I don't want to lose my 1.5k+ normal wins (yeah, normal wins...I'm the ultimate filthy casual gamer)

Will I lose stats like that if I transfer?

replies.body:
I found this on Riots FAQ page for account transfer.

**_Things that WILL transfer_**

Summoner Level 
Champions and skins (ward skins too) 
Runes 
Rune pages 
Summoner icons 
IP and XP boosts 
IP balance 
Remaining RP (after the cost of the transfer) 
Hextech Crafting inventory 
Champion Mastery levels 
Hidden MMR value 
Statistics: games played, takedowns, wins, etc 
Loading screen borders 
Your Placement Matches 
Item Sets * 
Summoner name and username **
* as long as your Summoner name does not change
** as long as it is available on the new server

**_Things that WONT transfer_**

Friends list 
Honor Points and Crests 
Forum Badges 
Justice Rating 
Current Ranked League placement 
Team Rewards points

Hope this helps :)

> [{quoted}](name=Miicka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lvJEQg39,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-04T01:26:39.234+0000)
>
> **_Things that WONT transfer_**
> 
> Friends list 
> Honor Points and Crests 
> Forum Badges 
> Justice Rating 
> Current Ranked League placement 
> Team Rewards points
> 
> Hope this helps :)

YOU'RE SAYING IT WON'T MOVE ALL OF MY FRIENDS TO THE NEW SERVER? WHAT IS THIS RITO

In all seriousness though, this was insanely helpful, thanks man!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Hey,

When I changed from NA to OCE it did wipe my games from my profile, However, I have noticed when I play a game it shows I have won over 900 whilst the game is loading and when I am waiting for team mates to accept to play... So in my experience it does semi wipe your game history if you are basing it off your profile

> [{quoted}](name=Inuyasha,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lvJEQg39,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-04T02:25:20.485+0000)
>
> Hey,
> 
> When I changed from NA to OCE it did wipe my games from my profile, However, I have noticed when I play a game it shows I have won over 900 whilst the game is loading and when I am waiting for team mates to accept to play... So in my experience it does semi wipe your game history if you are basing it off your profile

So lets say in my profile, on the bottom right corner there's the ranked/classic/ARAM section, under that in Classic I have 1631 wins (holy shit I need to get a life lol), is that gonna disappear?
Pretty sure I remember my stats being reset when I moved to OCE when it opened up
Was a long time ago though, could be wronk
